codes.code: h1, h2, h3 { color:blue; font-weight:bold; } h3 { font-style:italic; }
div p { font-weight:bold; } div p h1 { font-style:italic; }
div > p { font-weight:bold; } div > p > h1 { font-style:italic; }
div + p { font-weight:bold; } div + p + h1 { font-style:italic; }
div ~ p { font-weight:bold; } /* div ~ p ~ h1 { font-style:italic; } */
